cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: to roar, to howl, to shriek, roar or howl of an animal, bellow of rage

exm.mng: to roar, to howl, to shriek, roar or howl of an animal, bellow of rage
to bellow, to rave, to snarl
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom), fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
